en: It is absurd of you to do that.
zh: 你那样做真是荒谬。

en: It is no use your trying to deny it.
zh: 你试图否认它也是没用的。

en: It is a great pity that you don't know it.
zh: 你不知道这件事真是太可惜了。

en: It makes no difference to me whether you believe it or not.
zh: 你信不信对我来说都无所谓。

en: It makes little difference to me whether you believe it or not.
zh: 你信不信对我来说没什么区别。

en: It is right that you should write it.
zh: 你写它是对的。

en: The day will come when you will realize it.
zh: 总有一天你会意识到这件事的。

en: The time will come when you'll regret it.
zh: 总有一天你会后悔的。

en: I'm glad you liked it.
zh: 我很高兴你喜欢它。

en: You are mad to try to do it all alone.
zh: 你独自一人尝试做这件事真是疯了。

en: I wish you had not told the story to my mother.
zh: 我真希望你没有把这件事告诉我妈妈。

en: When was it that you visited the museum?
zh: 你是什么时候参观博物馆的？

en: It is no wonder that you are turning down the proposal.
zh: 你拒绝这个提议一点也不奇怪。

en: What made it difficult for you to carry out the plan?
zh: 是什么让你难以执行这个计划？

en: It is absolutely necessary that you be at the meeting.
zh: 你务必参加会议。

en: You have no good reason for thinking as you do.
zh: 你没有理由那样想。

en: I cannot believe you did not see him then.
zh: 我简直不敢相信你当时没看见他。

en: Ten to one you can pass the test.
zh: 十有八九你能通过考试。

en: The time will come when you will be sorry for it.
zh: 总有一天你会为此感到后悔的。

en: I'll do it, if you insist.
zh: 如果你坚持，我就做。

en: I can't work with you standing there.
zh: 你站在那里我没法工作。

en: By the time you got there, the sun had set.
zh: 等你到那里的时候，太阳已经下山了。

en: You gave me a real surprise when you showed up there.
zh: 你出现在那里真是让我大吃一惊。

en: Since you say so.
zh: 既然你这么说。

en: You may well say so, but I cannot agree.
zh: 你这么说也许没错，但我不能同意。

en: We planted peanuts instead of cotton.
zh: 我们种了花生，没种棉花。

en: We'll likely go to the ball game tomorrow.
zh: 我们明天很可能会去看球赛。

en: We will have to get over the feeling of helplessness.
zh: 我们必须克服无力感。

en: We danced in the subdued lighting.
zh: 我们在柔和的灯光下跳舞。

en: We carried out our mission successfully.
zh: 我们成功地完成了任务。

en: We chaired the meeting democratically.
zh: 我们以民主的方式主持了会议。

en: We stand for democracy.
zh: 我们支持民主。

en: We believe in democracy.
zh: 我们相信民主。

en: We live in a society of democracy.
zh: 我们生活在一个民主社会。

en: We were looking for buried treasure.
zh: 我们当时在寻找埋藏的宝藏。

en: We heard it from Mr Such and such.
zh: 我们是从某某先生那里听说的。

en: We cannot really predict anything.
zh: 我们真的无法预测任何事情。

en: We should not resort to violence.
zh: 我们不应该诉诸暴力。

en: We will not bend to the will of a tyrant.
zh: 我们不会屈服于暴君的意志。

en: We are bound to obey the law.
zh: 我们有义务遵守法律。

en: We were attacked by swarms of bees.
zh: 我们受到了蜂群的攻击。

en: We gave our mother a watch.
zh: 我们送给妈妈一块手表。

en: We derive further pleasure from our study.
zh: 我们从学习中获得了更多的乐趣。

en: We broke up and went our own ways.
zh: 我们分手了，各走各的路。

en: We must preserve our peaceful constitution.
zh: 我们必须维护我们和平的宪法。

en: We parted, never to see each other again.
zh: 我们分手了，再也没有见过面。

en: We should try to make the conquest of peace.
zh: 我们应该努力去赢得和平。

en: We are a peace-loving nation.
zh: 我们是一个热爱和平的民族。

en: We are working in the interest of peace.
zh: 我们正在为和平的利益而努力。

en: We tried to project our analysis into the future.
zh: 我们试图将我们的分析推演到未来。

en: Nothing is so tasty as the dish you make.
zh: 你做的菜最美味。

en: I'll help you so long as you do your best.
zh: 只要你尽力，我就会帮助你。

en: Choose the color you like the best.
zh: 选择你最喜欢的颜色。

en: The paint on the seat on which you are sitting is still wet.
zh: 你坐的座位上的油漆还没干。

en: It makes little difference whether you go today or tomorrow.
zh: 你今天去或明天去没什么区别。

en: It will not make much difference whether you go today or tomorrow.
zh: 你今天去或明天去不会有太大区别。

en: Your mother has made you what you are.
zh: 你母亲成就了现在的你。

en: What you've just told me chimes in with what I heard yesterday.
zh: 你刚才告诉我的和我昨天听到的不谋而合。

en: What you need the most now is courage.
zh: 你现在最需要的是勇气。

en: This is all you have to do now.
zh: 这就是你现在需要做的全部。

en: It is necessary for you to go and encourage the girl.
zh: 你有必要去鼓励那个女孩。

en: It makes no difference whether you go or not.
zh: 你去不去都一样。

en: You don't need to go unless you want to.
zh: 除非你想去，否则你不需要去。

en: If you don't go, I won't, either.
zh: 如果你不去，我也不去。

en: You don't have to go unless you want to.
zh: 除非你想去，否则你不必去。

en: I don't care as long as you are happy.
zh: 只要你开心，我不在乎。

en: Your meaning is beyond me.
zh: 我不明白你的意思。

en: What you have said applies only to single women.
zh: 你所说的话只适用于单身女性。

en: What you said surprised me.
zh: 你说的话让我很惊讶。

en: Whatever you may say, I won't give it up.
zh: 无论你说什么，我都不会放弃。

en: The picture you are looking at is a copy of a Picasso.
zh: 你正在看的这幅画是毕加索的复制品。

en: The picture you are looking at costs 100,000 yen.
zh: 你正在看的这幅画价值10万日元。

en: What I can't make out is why you have changed your mind.
zh: 我不明白的是你为什么改变了主意。

en: I'll make allowances for your lack of experience.
zh: 我会体谅你缺乏经验。

en: By the time you get out of jail, she'll probably have gotten married.
zh: 等你出狱的时候，她可能已经结婚了。

en: You are old enough to know better.
zh: 你都这么大了，应该懂事了。

en: You should study harder.
zh: 你应该更努力学习。

en: You must study much harder.
zh: 你必须更加努力地学习。

en: All you have to do is to work harder.
zh: 你只需要更努力地工作。

en: You should be more careful.
zh: 你应该更小心一点。

en: You should take better care of yourself.
zh: 你应该更好地照顾自己。

en: It is regrettable that you did not start earlier.
zh: 你没有早点开始，真是遗憾。

en: You should have come home before.
zh: 你应该早点回家的。

en: You should have completed it long ago.
zh: 你应该早就完成它了。

en: You should eat more, or you won't get well soon.
zh: 你应该多吃点，不然你不会很快好起来的。

en: You had better speak more naturally.
zh: 你最好说得更自然一些。

en: You'd better try to assert yourself more.
zh: 你最好试着更坚定自己一些。

en: You should have been more careful with your health.
zh: 你应该更注意你的健康。

en: You ought to have been more careful.
zh: 你本应该更小心的。

en: You need to study harder.
zh: 你需要更努力地学习。

en: You should have worked harder.
zh: 你应该更努力工作的。

en: I think it necessary for you to study harder.
zh: 我认为你有必要更努力地学习。

en: You should have been more careful.
zh: 你应该更小心的。

en: You belong in a better place than this.
zh: 你应该待在一个比这里更好的地方。

en: You should have come earlier.
zh: 你应该早点来的。

en: Do you like Mozart's music?
zh: 你喜欢莫扎特的音乐吗？

en: Have you taken your medicine yet?
zh: 你吃药了吗？

en: Have you solved all the problems yet?
zh: 你解决完所有问题了吗？

en: It's high time you had a haircut.
zh: 你早该理发了。

en: You are old enough to stand on your own feet.
zh: 你都这么大了，应该自力更生了。

en: You don't have to go to school on Sunday.
zh: 星期天你不用上学。

en: What do you usually do on Sundays?
zh: 你星期天通常做什么？

en: Are you a Japanese student?
zh: 你是日本学生吗？

en: Do you keep a diary?
zh: 你写日记吗？

en: Do you know how to cook meat?
zh: 你知道怎么做肉吗？

en: You could count to ten when you were two.
zh: 你两岁的时候就能数到十了。

en: You could count to ten when you were two years old.
zh: 你两岁的时候就能数到十了。

en: You are not old enough to go swimming by yourself.
zh: 你年纪太小，不能自己去游泳。

en: You work too hard.
zh: 你工作太努力了。

en: You are working too hard. Take it easy for a while.
zh: 你工作太努力了。放松一会儿吧。

en: You can't feel at ease with a headache.
zh: 头疼的时候你无法感到放松。

en: You are too clever not to solve the hard problem.
zh: 你太聪明了，不可能解决不了这个难题。

en: You know the answer?
zh: 你知道答案吗？

en: Do you live here?
zh: 你住在这里吗？

en: I take it for granted that you will join.
zh: 我理所当然地认为你会参加。

en: I took it for granted that you were on my side.
zh: 我理所当然地认为你会站在我这边。

en: You don't go to school on Sunday, do you?
zh: 你星期天不上学，是吗？

en: You had better study English thoroughly.
zh: 你最好彻底学习英语。

en: You may as well leave at once.
zh: 你最好立刻离开。

en: You must go home at once.
zh: 你必须立刻回家。

en: It is necessary for you to see a doctor at once.
zh: 你有必要立刻去看医生。

en: You may as well withdraw from the club right away.
zh: 你最好立刻退出俱乐部。

en: Don't you know that you are the laughingstock of the whole town?
zh: 难道你不知道你成了全镇的笑柄吗？

en: You must be a late riser.
zh: 你一定是经常晚起的人。

en: What do you have for breakfast?
zh: 你早餐吃什么？

en: You are not to neglect your duty.
zh: 你不得玩忽职守。

en: You must do your duty.
zh: 你必须履行你的职责。

en: Yoshio said he would pay as much as 15000 yen for a new pair of basketball shoes, but I thought that was quite expensive.
zh: 吉雄说他愿意花15000日元买一双新的篮球鞋，但我认为那太贵了。

en: My brother-in-law is ready to lose his temper at trifles.
zh: 我的姐夫/妹夫/大伯/小叔/姑父/姨夫很容易为小事发脾气。

en: Faith which does not doubt is dead faith.
zh: 没有怀疑的信仰是死的信仰。

en: There's a blind man looking for a shadow of doubt.
zh: 有个瞎子在寻找一丝疑影。

en: There is no room for doubt.
zh: 毫无疑问。

en: One question was what I was going to be.
zh: 一个问题是我将来要做什么。

en: The question is whether Mike knew the fact or not.
zh: 问题是迈克是否知道这件事。

en: It was not what he said, but the way he said it that made me suspicious.
zh: 让我起疑心的不是他说的话，而是他说话的方式。

en: One thing remains doubtful.
zh: 有一件事仍然令人怀疑。

en: Without a doubt!
zh: 毫无疑问！

en: Suspicion is destructive of friendship.
zh: 怀疑会破坏友谊。

en: There is little room for doubt.
zh: 几乎没有怀疑的余地。

en: I feel profound sympathy for the victims.
zh: 我对受害者深表同情。

en: You cannot make omelets without breaking eggs.
zh: 不打碎鸡蛋就做不成煎蛋卷。

en: As to onomatopoetic expressions, we find interesting examples in Hopi.
zh: 至于拟声词，我们在霍皮语中发现了一些有趣的例子。

en: Engineers are crazy about solar energy.
zh: 工程师们对太阳能非常着迷。

en: The engineer seeks not so much to know nature as to make use of it.
zh: 工程师与其说是想了解自然，不如说是想利用自然。

en: The shortage of engineers is the greatest bottleneck to the development of our company.
zh: 工程师短缺是我们公司发展的最大瓶颈。

en: Technological innovation brought about the rapid progress of the information industry.
zh: 技术创新带来了信息产业的快速发展。

en: Thanks to the technological innovation, the maximum output of the factory has doubled.
zh: 由于技术创新，工厂的最大产量翻了一番。

en: The engineer climbed the telephone pole.
zh: 工程师爬上了电线杆。

en: The engineer demonstrated how to operate the sophisticated system.
zh: 工程师演示了如何操作这个复杂的系统。

en: The ceremony began with his speech.
zh: 仪式以他的演讲开始。

en: You can swim, can't you?
zh: 你会游泳，是吧？

en: Can you swim?
zh: 你会游泳吗？

en: You can't swim, can you?
zh: 你不会游泳，是吗？

en: I think you'll have very little difficulty in getting a driver's license.
zh: 我觉得你很容易就能拿到驾照。

en: You're still too young to get a driver's license.
zh: 你年纪太小，还不能考驾照。

en: You're in luck. The plane is on time.
zh: 你真幸运，飞机准时到达。

en: You are tallest.
zh: 你是最高的。

en: You must not tell a lie.
zh: 你一定不能说谎。

en: What are you driving at?
zh: 你到底想说什么？

en: Did you read it at all?
zh: 你到底有没有读过？

en: You have only to study hard, and you will pass the test.
zh: 你只要努力学习，就能通过考试。

en: You have only to study hard.
zh: 你只要努力学习。

en: Being a teacher, you must learn to keep a tight rein on your emotions.
zh: 作为一名老师，你必须学会控制自己的情绪。

en: You'll never be alone.
zh: 你永远不会孤单。

en: You should follow the doctor's advice.
zh: 你应该听从医生的建议。

en: You'd better consult the doctor.
zh: 你最好去咨询一下医生。

en: You had better ask the doctor for advice.
zh: 你最好去问问医生。

en: You are strong-minded.
zh: 你意志坚强。

en: I'm surprised that you're so naïve.
zh: 我很惊讶你竟然这么天真。

en: You've done it!
zh: 你成功了！

en: Do you remember seeing me before?
zh: 你记得以前见过我吗？

en: You must conquer your fear of the dark.
zh: 你必须克服对黑暗的恐惧。

en: You should return home before it gets dark.
zh: 你应该在天黑之前回家。

en: You are in a safe place.
zh: 你现在在一个安全的地方。

en: You may rest assured; I have no ulterior motive in making this donation.
zh: 你放心吧，我捐款没有任何其他的目的。

en: I want something with which to write.
zh: 我想要用来写字的东西。

en: Do you have something to write with?
zh: 你有什么可以用来写字的东西吗？

en: I need something to write with.
zh: 我需要用来写字的东西。

en: I want something to write on.
zh: 我想要用来写的东西。

en: Give me something to write with.
zh: 给我一些可以用来写字的东西。

en: Give me something to write on.
zh: 给我一些可以用来写的东西。

en: Will you give us a statement?
zh: 你们能给我们一份声明吗？

en: He did not understand what was in the way of his success in life.
zh: 他不明白是什么阻碍了他获得人生的成功。

en: Do you collect anything?
zh: 你收集什么东西吗？

en: Can I help you?
zh: 我能帮你吗？

en: I should have done something.
zh: 我本应该做些什么的。

en: If something does happen, I'll just play it by ear.
zh: 如果真的发生了什么，我就随机应变。

en: Do you have any questions?
zh: 你有什么问题吗？

en: Wire me at once, in case there should be an accident.
zh: 万一发生意外，请立刻给我发电报。

en: There appears to have been an accident.
zh: 好像发生了事故。

en: I need to find out exactly what went wrong.
zh: 我需要弄清楚到底哪里出了问题。

en: I will be able to see you tomorrow unless something unexpected turns up.
zh: 除非发生什么意外，否则我明天可以见到你。

en: Give me something to do.
zh: 给我一些事情做。

en: Do you subscribe to any magazines?
zh: 你订阅什么杂志吗？

en: I think there has been some misunderstanding here.
zh: 我想这里面有些误会。

en: What do you want me to do?
zh: 你想让我做什么？

en: Is there anything I can do for you?
zh: 有什么我可以帮你的吗？

en: May I say something?
zh: 我可以讲几句吗？

en: If you have something to say, say it now or pipe down.
zh: 如果你有什么要说的，现在就说，不然就闭嘴。

en: What's the cause?
zh: 原因是什么？

en: I waited outside on the chance of seeing you.
zh: 我一直在外面等着，希望能有机会见到你。

en: I'm very glad to see you.
zh: 我很高兴见到你。

en: I am looking forward to seeing you.
zh: 我期待着见到你。

en: It's always delightful to see you.
zh: 很高兴能见到你。

en: To see you is always a great pleasure.
zh: 见到你总是令人愉快。

en: I was chagrined at missing you.
zh: 错过了你，我感到很懊恼。

en: How I've missed you!
zh: 我多么想你啊！

en: I'll tell you how to swim.
zh: 我来告诉你怎么游泳。

en: I would like you to come with me.
zh: 我想让你和我一起去。

en: There is a piece of good news for you.
zh: 有个好消息要告诉你。

en: You are in part responsible for it.
zh: 你对此负有部分责任。

en: I want you to work harder.
zh: 我希望你更努力地工作。

en: I want to see you again.
zh: 我想再见到你。

en: I'm leaving it to you.
zh: 我把它交给你了。

en: You have a bright future.
zh: 你前途光明。

en: He couldn't be good for you.
zh: 他对你来说不是个好人。

en: You have no cause for anger.
zh: 你没有理由生气。

en: You've got nothing to complain of.
zh: 你没什么可抱怨的。

en: You shall want for nothing.
zh: 你不会缺少任何东西。

en: I feel indebted to you for your help during my illness.
zh: 我非常感谢你在我生病期间对我的帮助。

en: You have knowledge and experience as well.
zh: 你既有知识又有经验。

en: What seems simple to you seems complex to me.
zh: 对你来说很简单的事情，对我来说却很复杂。

en: I take my hat off to you.
zh: 我向你致敬。

en: I want you to be the next Soseki.
zh: 我希望你成为下一个漱石。

en: You have as much right as everyone else.
zh: 你和所有人一样有权利。

en: But the possibility seems unlikely.
zh: 但这种可能性似乎不大。

en: I shouldn't have logged off.
zh: 我不应该退出的。

en: I don't know what to do anymore.
zh: 我不知道该怎么办了。

en: It is inevitable that I go to France someday, I just don't know when.
zh: 我总有一天会去法国是不可避免的，我只是不知道什么时候。

en: I hate chemistry.
zh: 我讨厌化学。

en: I didn't want this to happen.
zh: 我不希望发生这种事。

en: You can probably guess what happens though.
zh: 不过你大概能猜到会发生什么。

en: Next thing you know, you'll be in the papers.
zh: 接下来你就会发现你上报纸了。

en: What other options do I have?
zh: 我还有什么其他选择？

en: I am not much of a traveller.
zh: 我不太喜欢旅行。

en: I have nothing better to do.
zh: 我没有更好的事情可做。

en: I can't explain it either.
zh: 我也无法解释。

en: Everyone has strengths and weaknesses.
zh: 每个人都有优点和缺点。

en: Seriously though, episode 21 made me almost cry while laughing.
zh: 说真的，第21集让我又哭又笑。

en: It only shows you're not a robot.
zh: 这只能说明你不是机器人。

en: How could I be a robot? Robots don't dream.
zh: 我怎么可能是机器人？机器人不做梦。

en: It's not something anyone can do.
zh: 这不是任何人都能做到的。

en: I don't know if I still have it.
zh: 我不知道我是否还拥有它。

en: What do you think I've been doing?
zh: 你觉得我一直在做什么？

en: Don't underestimate my power.
zh: 不要低估我的力量。

en: My mom doesn't speak English very well.
zh: 我妈妈英语说得不太好。

en: I don't speak French well enough!
zh: 我的法语说得不够好！

en: I was wondering if you were going to show up today.
zh: 我一直在想你今天会不会出现。

en: Therein lies the problem.
zh: 问题就在这里。

en: How do you find food in outer space?
zh: 在太空中你怎么找食物？

en: Either you or your brother is wrong.
zh: 要么是你错了，要么是你弟弟错了。

en: I know you are rich.
zh: 我知道你很有钱。

en: You can't be hungry. You've just had dinner.
zh: 你不可能饿。你刚吃过晚饭。

en: I hope you'll never turn Communist.
zh: 我希望你永远不要变成共产主义者。

en: What a lonely world it will be with you away!
zh: 你不在的话，这个世界会多么寂寞啊！

en: Be sure to put out the fire before you leave.
zh: 走之前一定要把火熄灭。

en: I will not allow you to be ill-treated.
zh: 我不会允许你被虐待。

en: He will be studying when you get up.
zh: 你起床的时候，他会在学习。

en: She'll have left before you come back.
zh: 你回来之前她就已经离开了。

en: I wish you could drop in at my house on your way home.
zh: 我希望你能在回家路上顺便来我家坐坐。

en: I'll stay here till you get back.
zh: 我会待在这里直到你回来。

en: I will have finished the work before you return.
zh: 在你回来之前，我会完成这项工作。

en: The money you give them will be put to good use.
zh: 你给他们的钱会被好好利用的。

en: Thanks to your stupidity, we lost the game.
zh: 多亏了你的愚蠢，我们输了比赛。

en: It's clear that you're wrong.
zh: 很明显你错了。

en: I do not for a moment think you are wrong.
zh: 我一点也不认为你错了。

en: I can't help but think you're making a mistake.
zh: 我不禁认为你正在犯一个错误。

en: If you are wrong, I am wrong too.
zh: 如果你错了，我也错了。

en: You shouldn't have paid the bill.
zh: 你不应该付账的。

en: It is important for you to learn a foreign language.
zh: 学习一门外语对你来说很重要。

en: I'll open the curtain for you to look out.
zh: 我会为你拉开窗帘，让你向外看。

en: I'm counting on you to join us.
zh: 我指望你加入我们。

en: I am counting on you to join us.
zh: 我指望你加入我们。

en: It is a pity that you cannot travel with us.
zh: 很遗憾你不能和我们一起旅行。

en: Hearing you sing, people might take you for a girl.
zh: 听你唱歌，人们可能会把你当成女孩。

en: What is the difference between imitation and real diamonds?
zh: 仿制品钻石和真钻石有什么区别？

en: Beware of imitations.
zh: 谨防假冒。

en: Hypocrisy is my abhorrence.
zh: 我厌恶虚伪。

en: Hypocrisy is the homage that vice pays to virtue.
zh: 虚伪是罪恶对美德的敬意。

en: I don't need fake friends.
zh: 我不需要虚情假意的朋友。

en: Experience without learning is better than learning without experience.
zh: 没有学习的经验胜过没有经验的学习。

en: When the cat is away, the mice will play.
zh: 山中无老虎，猴子称大王。

en: Even the hard-hearted can be moved to tears.
zh: 铁石心肠的人也会感动落泪。

en: Fortune is the rod of the weak, and the staff of the brave.
zh: 幸运是弱者的拐杖，勇气是勇者的手杖。

en: There's no telling what kind of trouble this proposal might stir up. The result is certainly going to be something to see.
zh: 很难说这个提议会引起什么样的麻烦。结果肯定会很有看头。

en: In the days of the knights, they wore shields to protect themselves from sword-fight wounds.
zh: 在骑士时代，他们佩戴盾牌来保护自己免受剑伤。

en: The prospect of famine hangs over many areas of the world.
zh: 饥荒的前景笼罩着世界上的许多地区。

en: Because of the famine, the cattle starved to death.
zh: 由于饥荒，牲畜饿死了。

en: Disease and famine go together.
zh: 疾病和饥荒相伴相生。

en: Can you share food with others in the face of famine?
zh: 面对饥荒，你能和别人分享食物吗？

en: Famine caused great distress among the people.
zh: 饥荒给人民带来了巨大的痛苦。

en: I might as well drown as starve.
zh: 与其饿死，不如淹死。

en: Hunger knows no law.
zh: 饥饿不讲法律。

en: Hunger is one of the strongest griefs.
zh: 饥饿是最强烈的悲伤之一。

en: Hunger impelled him to crime.
zh: 饥饿驱使他犯罪。

en: We can say that Japan was fighting a constant battle against hunger during the war.
zh: 我们可以说，日本在战争期间一直在与饥饿作斗争。

en: It is sad that so few people give money to help the hungry.
zh: 很少有人捐钱帮助饥饿的人，这令人难过。

en: Shine on my brilliant soul.
zh: 照耀我辉煌的灵魂。

en: I gasped with surprise at the horrible picture of the starving people.
zh: 看到饥民的可怕景象，我惊讶地倒吸了一口气。

en: All that glitters is not gold.
zh: 闪光的不一定是金子。

en: If there were no air, man could not live even ten minutes.
zh: 如果没有空气，人活不到十分钟。

en: If it were not for air, we could not live.
zh: 如果没有空气，我们就无法生存。

en: But for air, all living things would die.
zh: 如果没有空气，所有生物都会死亡。

en: Without air there can be no wind or sound on the moon.
zh: 没有空气，月球上就不会有风或声音。

en: A bat flying in the sky looks like a butterfly.
zh: 在天空中飞行的蝙蝠看起来像蝴蝶。

en: Seen against the sky, the mountain looked really beautiful.
zh: 在天空的映衬下，这座山看起来非常美丽。

en: It is difficult to shoot a bird flying in the air.
zh: 很难射击一只在空中飞行的鸟。

en: Who is looking up into the sky?
zh: 谁在仰望天空？

en: The skies promise better weather in the morning.
zh: 天空预示着明天会有更好的天气。

en: Look up to the skies.
zh: 抬头看看天空。

en: A balloon is ascending into the sky.
zh: 一个气球正在升入天空。

en: The sky was fiery with the setting sun.
zh: 夕阳将天空染成火红色。

en: The sky was as clear as ever.
zh: 天空一如既往地晴朗。

en: The sky is becoming cloudy.
zh: 天空变得多云了。

en: The sky is blue.
zh: 天空是蓝色的。

en: The sky is clear and the sun is bright.
zh: 天空晴朗，阳光明媚。

en: The sky was bright and clear.
zh: 天空晴朗明亮。

en: The sky is full of stars.
zh: 天空布满了星星。

en: The sky is over our heads.
zh: 天空在我们头顶上方。

en: The sky grew darker and darker.
zh: 天空变得越来越暗。

en: The sky was ablaze with fireworks.
zh: 天空被烟花照亮。

en: The sky is covered with clouds.
zh: 天空布满了云。

en: The sky clouded over.
zh: 天空阴云密布。

en: The sky was completely dark.
zh: 天空一片漆黑。

en: The sky grew darker and darker, and the wind blew harder and harder.
zh: 天空变得越来越暗，风也越来越大。

en: I want to go abroad.
zh: 我想出国。

en: It's fun to learn about foreign cultures.
zh: 了解外国文化很有趣。

en: Do you have any foreign stamps?
zh: 你有没有外国邮票？

en: There are a number of shops selling foreign books and periodicals.
zh: 有很多商店出售外国书籍和期刊。

en: Keep in touch with what is happening in foreign countries.
zh: 随时了解国外发生的事情。

en: Do you have any imported beer?
zh: 你们有进口啤酒吗？

en: You need a passport to enter a foreign country.
zh: 你需要护照才能进入外国。

en: Don't you feel any inconvenience living abroad?
zh: 你在国外生活不觉得不方便吗？

en: Living abroad is the best way to learn a foreign language.
zh: 在国外生活是学习外语的最佳方式。

en: You learn a lot about your own country if you live abroad.
zh: 如果你在国外生活，你会更多地了解自己的国家。

en: I'm thinking of going abroad.
zh: 我正在考虑出国。

en: If I were to go abroad, I would go by boat.
zh: 如果我要出国，我会乘船去。

en: In a foreign country most of us go through culture shock.
zh: 在国外，我们大多数人都会经历文化冲击。

en: I haven't heard from my son who is overseas.
zh: 我没有收到我儿子的消息，他在海外。

en: I couldn't make myself understood in a foreign country.
zh: 我在国外无法让别人理解我。

en: No matter how busy he was while living abroad, he never failed to write home to his parents at least once a week.
zh: 无论他在国外生活多么忙碌，他每周至少都会给父母写信一次。

en: It is important to try to get along with people from foreign countries.
zh: 重要的是要努力与来自外国的人相处。

en: We have to buy them from abroad.
zh: 我们必须从国外购买它们。

en: The foreign executives visited the manufacturing plant.
zh: 外国高管参观了制造工厂。

en: A group of foreign students visited Akira's high school.
zh: 一群外国学生参观了明的高中。

en: In foreign countries, especially in Western countries, students are encouraged to express and develop themselves as individuals.
zh: 在国外，尤其是在西方国家，学生被鼓励表达和发展自己的个性。

en: Have you visited foreign countries, say America?
zh: 你去过外国吗，比如美国？

en: Diplomatic dialogue helped put an end to the conflict.
zh: 外交对话帮助结束了冲突。

en: Diplomacy is to do and say the nastiest thing in the nicest way.
zh: 外交就是以最友好的方式做和说最令人讨厌的事情。

en: An ambassador is an honest man sent to lie abroad for the good of his country.
zh: 大使是一个诚实的人，被派往国外为他的国家说谎。

en: John met Mary on his way to school.
zh: 约翰在上学的路上遇到了玛丽。

en: While I was going to school, I was caught in a shower.
zh: 我去上学的时候，淋了一场雨。

en: What is the principle reason for going to school?
zh: 去学校的主要原因是什么？

en: It's time to go to school.
zh: 该去上学了。

en: I put on a cap when I go to school.
zh: 我去上学的时候戴一顶帽子。

en: Instead of going to school, he stayed at home.
zh: 他没有去上学，而是呆在家里。

en: You are not going to make it in time for school.
zh: 你上学要迟到了。

en: I live within walking distance of school.
zh: 我住在离学校步行可达的距离内。

en: Why are you here when you should be in school?
zh: 你应该在学校，你为什么在这里？

en: Would you mail this letter for me on your way to school?
zh: 你上学的时候能帮我把这封信寄了吗？

en: If you are to do well in school, you must study hard.
zh: 如果你想在学校表现出色，你必须努力学习。

en: Teaching spontaneous thinking is difficult in schools.
zh: 在学校里教授自发性思维是很困难的。

en: How often do you study English at school?
zh: 你在学校多久学习一次英语？

en: Remember well what you learn at school.
zh: 好好记住你在学校学到的东西。

en: The school is crying out for good teachers.
zh: 学校急需优秀的老师。

en: You are not supposed to smoke at school.
zh: 你不应该在学校吸烟。

en: At school he was always at the top of his class.
zh: 在学校里，他总是班里最好的学生。

en: At school I am on the Newspaper Committee.
zh: 我在学校是报社委员会的。

en: My school is getting ready for the campus music festival.
zh: 我的学校正在为校园音乐节做准备。

en: What subjects do you study at school?
zh: 你在学校学习什么科目？

en: Schools have tried to limit their use by not allowing them to be used in math classes, although they allow them in science lessons to save time.
zh: 学校试图限制计算器的使用，不允许在数学课上使用，但在科学课上允许使用，以节省时间。

en: This was third school shooting incident in six months.
zh: 这是六个月内发生的第三起校园枪击事件。

en: I wanted to have finished it by the time school was over.
zh: 我想在放学前完成它。

en: Success in school calls for much hard study.
zh: 在学校取得成功需要努力学习。

en: School being over, we went home.
zh: 放学后，我们回家了。

en: Your dress is unsuitable for the occasion.
zh: 你的穿着不适合这个场合。

en: Your room is out of order.
zh: 你的房间坏了。

en: Your room is twice the size of mine.
zh: 你的房间是我的两倍大。

en: Your room must always be kept clean.
zh: 你的房间必须时刻保持干净。

en: You have been beaten. Give in!
zh: 你被打败了。认输吧！

en: Your father's supporters are not limited to his friends.
zh: 你父亲的支持者不限于他的朋友。

en: Please give my regards to your father.
zh: 请代我向你父亲问好。

en: Your father went through all that trouble for your sake.
zh: 你父亲为了你费了那么多心思。

en: I'm tired of your complaints.
zh: 我厌倦了你的抱怨。

en: Your wrongdoing is a disgrace to our school.
zh: 你的错误行为是我们学校的耻辱。

en: Your smile always makes me happy.
zh: 你的微笑总是让我快乐。

en: Your estimation of him is a little high, to say the least.
zh: 至少可以说，你对他的评价有点高。

en: It's your move.
zh: 该你走了。

en: Your hair is too long.
zh: 你的头发太长了。

en: Your hair really does look untidy.
zh: 你的头发看起来真的很乱。

en: Your remarks are off the point.
zh: 你的话离题了。

en: Your problem is similar to mine.
zh: 你的问题和我的相似。

en: You should know better at your age.
zh: 你这么大了，应该更懂事。

en: At your age, I would think so, too.
zh: 在你这个年纪，我也会这么想。

en: At your age, you ought to know better.
zh: 你这么大了，应该更懂事。

en: Tell me about your daily life.
zh: 告诉我你每天的生活。

en: At your age you ought to support yourself.
zh: 你这么大了，应该自食其力。

en: Your second button is coming off.
zh: 你的第二个扣子要掉了。

en: You may read whichever book you like.
zh: 你可以读任何你喜欢的书。

en: Without your consent, nothing can be done about it.
zh: 没有你的同意，什么都做不了。

en: We have made numerous improvements to our house since we bought it.
zh: 自从我们买了房子，我们已经对房子做了很多改进。

en: It took them two years to build the house.
zh: 他们花了两年时间才盖好这栋房子。

en: I will take you home.
zh: 我送你回家。

en: I want you to refurbish the house.
zh: 我想让你重新装修这房子。

en: Could you please drive me home?
zh: 你能送我回家吗？

en: I'll drive you home.
zh: 我送你回家。

en: Shall I drive you home?
zh: 要我送你回家吗？

en: It is no inconvenience to drive you home.
zh: 送你回家一点也不麻烦。

en: Let us go home.
zh: 我们回家吧。

en: On my way home, I came across an old friend.
zh: 在回家的路上，我偶然遇到了一位老朋友。

en: As soon as he got home, he began to play a computer game.
zh: 他一到家，就开始玩电脑游戏。

en: Both buildings burned down.
zh: 两栋建筑物都被烧毁了。

en: The telephone was ringing when I got home.
zh: 我到家的时候，电话铃响了。

en: It was not until I got home that I missed my watch.
zh: 直到我回到家，我才发现我的手表不见了。

en: The house collapsed in an earthquake.
zh: 房子在地震中倒塌了。

en: The house was burned to the ground.
zh: 房子被烧成平地。

en: The houses caught fire one after another.
zh: 这些房子一个接一个地着火了。

en: Each house is within shouting distance of another.
zh: 每栋房子都在彼此的呼喊距离之内。

en: A house is built on top of a solid foundation of cement.
zh: 房子建在坚固的水泥基础上。

en: The house was in flames.
zh: 房子着火了。

en: My house was on fire.
zh: 我的房子着火了。

en: We have two cats; one is white, and the other is black.
zh: 我们有两只猫；一只白色的，另一只黑色的。

en: The house burned down completely.
zh: 房子完全烧毁了。

en: The house looked good; moreover, the price was right.
zh: 房子看起来不错；而且，价格也很合适。

en: My backyard can hold more than ten people.
zh: 我的后院可以容纳十多个人。

en: Open your book to page nine.
zh: 请把书翻到第九页。

en: There is a shuttle bus that goes to the Ginza Tokyu Hotel.
zh: 有一辆班车去银座东急酒店。

en: I ran into a friend while walking in Ginza.
zh: 我在银座散步时遇到了一个朋友。

en: Is the Ginza the busiest street in Japan?
zh: 银座是日本最繁华的街道吗？

en: We will make the payment by bank transfer.
zh: 我们将通过银行转账付款。

en: The bank robbers dispersed in all directions.
zh: 银行劫匪向四面八方逃散。

en: Bank robbery will cost you ten years in prison.
zh: 抢劫银行会让你坐十年牢。

en: I'm looking for a bank. Is there one near here?
zh: 我在找银行。这附近有银行吗？

en: I've been to the bank.
zh: 我去过银行了。

en: Can you tell me the way to the bank?
zh: 你能告诉我怎么去银行吗？

en: You'll see the bank on the left hand side of the hospital.
zh: 你会在医院的左手边看到银行。

en: A bank lends us money at interest.
zh: 银行以利息借钱给我们。

en: The bank holds a mortgage on his building.
zh: 银行拥有他的建筑物的抵押权。

en: The bank accommodated him with a loan of 10,000 yen.
zh: 银行为他提供了1万日元的贷款。

en: The bank loaned him 500 dollars.
zh: 银行借给他500美元。

en: The bank isn't open on Sundays.
zh: 银行星期天不开门。

en: The bank keeps money for people.
zh: 银行替人们保管钱。

en: Banks are cutting lending to industrial borrowers.
zh: 银行正在削减对工业借款人的贷款。

en: The bank loaned the company $1 million.
zh: 银行借给该公司一百万美元。

en: The bank reassured us that our money was safe.
zh: 银行向我们保证我们的钱是安全的。

en: The bank came through with the loan we had requested.
zh: 银行批准了我们要求的贷款。

en: How late is the bank open?
zh: 银行开到几点？

en: What are the banking hours?
zh: 银行的营业时间是什么时候？

en: Banks charge higher interest on loans to risky customers.
zh: 银行对风险较高的客户收取更高的贷款利息。

en: The bank accommodated the company with a loan.
zh: 银行向该公司提供了贷款。

en: We build and maintain relationships with others.
zh: 我们建立并维护与他人的关系。

en: We've become a mockery to the whole village.
zh: 我们成了全村的笑柄。

en: We are forty three in all.
zh: 我们总共有四十三个人。

en: We looked out the window but saw nothing.
zh: 我们向窗外看去，但什么也没看见。

en: We must sow the seeds of mutual understanding.
zh: 我们必须播下相互理解的种子。

en: We must beef up our organization.
zh: 我们必须加强我们的组织。

en: We agreed to start early.
zh: 我们同意早点开始。

en: We named my son after my grandfather.
zh: 我们用我祖父的名字给我儿子命名。

en: We set to work with all our might and main.
zh: 我们竭尽全力地开始工作。

en: There are seven of us.
zh: 我们有七个人。

en: We all knelt down to pray.
zh: 我们都跪下来祈祷。

en: We shared the profit among us all.
zh: 我们大家分享了利润。

en: We're elected.
zh: 我们当选了。

en: We have to distinguish right from wrong.
zh: 我们必须明辨是非。

en: We are entering a new phase in the war.
zh: 我们正在进入战争的新阶段。

en: We are against war.
zh: 我们反对战争。

en: We had to do without oil during the war.
zh: 战争期间我们不得不省着用油。

en: We will never countenance terrorism.
zh: 我们绝不允许恐怖主义存在。

en: We were driven to the wall.
zh: 我们被逼到了墙角。

en: We take oil for granted.
zh: 我们认为石油是理所当然的。

en: We sang songs in chorus.
zh: 我们一起合唱歌曲。

en: We need to nourish our spirit.
zh: 我们需要滋养我们的精神。

en: We work for our living.
zh: 我们为了生活而工作。

en: We eat to live, not live to eat.
zh: 我们为了活着而吃，而不是为了吃而活。

en: We eat so we can live.
zh: 我们为了活着才吃饭。

en: The sky is clear almost every day.
zh: 几乎每天天空都是晴朗的。

en: The sky is a hazy shade of winter.
zh: 天空是冬天朦胧的灰色。

en: The sky became darker and darker.

zh: 你看上去脸色发青。

en: He bore the future of the company on his shoulders.
zh: 他肩负着公司的未来。

en: The company is at the end of its rope.
zh: 公司已经走投无路了。

en: Want to grab a drink on the way home?
zh: 回家路上想喝一杯吗？

en: They chartered a bus for the firm's outing.
zh: 他们包了一辆巴士供公司郊游。

en: My company is sending us all to Hakone this year.
zh: 我们公司今年要送我们去箱根。

en: We all pigged out at the company Christmas party, especially on the roast beef.
zh: 在公司圣诞派对上，我们都吃撑了，尤其是烤牛肉。

en: New hires who just joined the company do everything in this timid manner.
zh: 刚加入公司的新员工都以这种胆怯的方式做事。

en: Some companies guarantee their workers a job for life.
zh: 有些公司保证他们的工人终身就业。

en: He's a pretty unique guy wearing bell bottoms and Hawaiian shirts to the office.
zh: 他是个非常独特的人，穿着喇叭裤和夏威夷衬衫去办公室。

en: Try to get ahead in your company.
zh: 努力在你的公司里取得进步。

en: His official title at the company is Assistant to the President.
zh: 他在公司的正式头衔是总裁助理。

en: The company is in deficit.
zh: 公司出现赤字。

en: The prospects for his career at the company are not quite promising.
zh: 他在公司的事业前景不太乐观。

en: When the company refused to increase their wages, they walked out.
zh: 当公司拒绝提高工资时，他们就罢工了。

en: I suggested that we bring the meeting to an end.
zh: 我建议我们结束会议。

en: We are having a meeting.
zh: 我们正在开会。

en: We insist that a meeting be held as soon as possible.
zh: 我们坚持尽快召开会议。

en: We got the meeting over with quickly.
zh: 我们很快就结束了会议。

en: The meeting is to be held next Thursday.
zh: 会议定于下周四举行。

en: There was a convention last month.
zh: 上个月有个大会。

en: The meeting was last month.
zh: 会议是上个月举行的。

en: The meeting was put off until next Friday.
zh: 会议被推迟到下周五。

en: The meeting will take place next Sunday.
zh: 会议将于下周日举行。

en: The meeting will commence.
zh: 会议即将开始。

en: The meeting began at five in the afternoon.
zh: 会议于下午五点开始。

en: I have an urgent matter to attend to.
zh: 我有个急事要处理。

en: Please hurry.
zh: 请快点。

en: Our bus comes late particularly when we are in a hurry.
zh: 我们赶时间的时候，公交车总是晚点。

en: We've really got to step on it.
zh: 我们真的得抓紧时间了。

en: Are you in a hurry?
zh: 你赶时间吗？

en: That sort of thing can happen when you are in haste.
zh: 那种事情在你匆忙的时候可能会发生。

en: When you're in a hurry, it's easy to make a mistake.
zh: 当你匆忙的时候，很容易犯错。

en: People who are not in a hurry stand on the right side of the escalator.
zh: 不着急的人站在自动扶梯的右侧。

en: We'd better make some time.
zh: 我们最好挤出点时间。

en: Hurry up. The train leaves in ten minutes. We don't want to miss it.
zh: 快点。火车十分钟后就要开了。我们不想错过它。

en: Hurry up. We've little time to waste.
zh: 快点。我们没多少时间可以浪费了。

en: Hurry up, or we'll be late.
zh: 快点，不然我们要迟到了。

en: Hurry up! Here comes the bus.
zh: 快点！公交车来了。

en: You had better hurry. The train leaves at three.
zh: 你最好快点。火车三点开。

en: Even though she rushed, the elderly woman missed the last train.
zh: 即使她很着急，那位老妇人还是错过了末班车。

en: All my haste was in vain.
zh: 我所有的匆忙都是徒劳的。

en: In my hurry I bumped into someone.
zh: 我匆忙中撞到了人。

en: In the palace live the king and the queen.
zh: 国王和王后住在宫殿里。

en: The palace has a tall tower.
zh: 这座宫殿有一座高塔。

en: Miyazaki is not what it used to be.
zh: 宫崎骏已经不是以前的样子了。

en: Blotting paper absorbs ink.
zh: 吸墨纸吸收墨水。

en: Legends of vampires flourish in the Balkans.
zh: 吸血鬼的传说在巴尔干半岛盛行。

en: I will help you all I can.
zh: 我会尽我所能帮助你。

en: Instead of taking a rest, he worked much harder than usual.
zh: 他没有休息，反而比平时更努力地工作。

en: You just need a good rest.
zh: 你只需要好好休息一下。

en: I will do all I can for you.
zh: 我会尽我所能为你效劳。

en: You should keep company with such men as can benefit you.
zh: 你应该和那些能让你受益的人交往。

en: Don't be angry with me, for I did it for your sake.
zh: 别生我的气，我是为了你好。

en: I am ready to do anything for you.
zh: 我愿意为你做任何事。

en: I will do anything for you.
zh: 我会为你做任何事。

en: I'd do any damn thing for you.
zh: 我愿意为你做任何该死的事。

en: I'd jump through hoops for you.
zh: 我愿意为你赴汤蹈火。

en: Your excellent work puts me to shame.
zh: 你出色的工作让我感到惭愧。

en: What's the weight of your suitcase?
zh: 你的手提箱有多重？

en: Your joke bears repeating.
zh: 你的笑话值得重复。

en: You went too far in your joke.
zh: 你的玩笑开过头了。

en: Your shirt is torn. You better put on another shirt.
zh: 你的衬衫破了。你最好换一件。

en: Your shirt button is coming off.
zh: 你的衬衫扣子要掉了。

en: I respect you for what you have done.
zh: 我敬佩你所做的一切。

en: This advice of yours will go a long way toward solving the problem.
zh: 你的这个建议对解决问题大有帮助。

en: We are worried about you.
zh: 我们很担心你。

en: I have absolute trust in you.
zh: 我绝对信任你。

en: Your words make me fear for my life.
zh: 你的话让我感到害怕，担心我的生命。

en: What are you fond of?
zh: 你喜欢什么？

en: Is this your glass or your sister's?
zh: 这是你的杯子还是你妹妹的？

en: Your cake is delicious.
zh: 你的蛋糕真好吃。

en: How many are there in your class?
zh: 你们班有多少人？

en: Your collar has a stain on it.
zh: 你的领子上有污渍。

en: Your camera is not as excellent as my camera.
zh: 你的相机不如我的相机好。

en: Your camera is only half the size of mine.
zh: 你的相机只有我的一半大小。

en: Do as you like.
zh: 你随意。

en: You may act however you wish.
zh: 你想做什么就做什么。

en: Make your choice.
zh: 你来选择吧。

en: You have the freedom to travel wherever you like.
zh: 你可以自由地去任何你想去的地方。

en: I am amazed at your audacity.
zh: 我惊讶于你的大胆。

en: You should make the best of your limited time.
zh: 你应该充分利用你有限的时间。

en: Your words are as good as violence.
zh: 你的话语和暴力一样伤人。

en: Your remark amounts almost to insult.
zh: 你的话几乎等同于侮辱。

en: Judging from what you say, he may succeed.
zh: 听你这么说，他可能会成功。

en: I know what you mean.
zh: 我明白你的意思。

en: What you are saying does not make sense.
zh: 你说的没有道理。

en: What you are saying is equal to "no", isn't it?
zh: 你说的等于“不”，对吧？

en: What you are saying is nothing but building a castle in the air.
zh: 你说的无非是空中楼阁。

en: I don't quite follow you.
zh: 我不太明白你的意思。

en: You're just being diplomatic.
zh: 你只是在说客套话。

en: You are not consistent.
zh: 你前后矛盾。

en: It appears to me that you are right.
zh: 我觉得你是对的。

en: She cannot have understood what you said.
zh: 她可能没听懂你说的。

en: I accept what you say to some extent.
zh: 我部分同意你说的。

en: What you said does not apply to this case.
zh: 你说的并不适用于这个情况。

en: What you said is also true of this case.
zh: 你说的也适用于这个情况。

en: What you say is neither here nor there.
zh: 你说的无关紧要。

en: Admitting what you say, I cannot agree with you.
zh: 就算你说的对，我还是不能同意你。

en: I think you're right.
zh: 我觉得你是对的。

en: Admitting what you say, I still think you are wrong.
zh: 就算你说的对，我仍然认为你是错的。

en: Oh, I'm sorry.
zh: 哦，对不起。

en: Math is like love - a simple idea, but it can get complicated.
zh: 数学就像爱情——一个简单的想法，但它可能会变得很复杂。

en: The only useful answers are those that raise new questions.
zh: 唯一有用的答案是那些能引发新问题的答案。

en: To have doubts about oneself is the first sign of intelligence.
zh: 对自己产生怀疑是智慧的第一个迹象。

en: Poor is not the one who has too little, but the one who wants too much.
zh: 贫穷不是拥有太少的人，而是想要太多的人。

en: Seeing that you're not surprised, I think you must have known.
zh: 看你并不惊讶，我想你一定早就知道了。

en: How long does it take to get to the station?
zh: 到车站要多久？

en: This will be a good souvenir of my trip around the United States.
zh: 这将是我环游美国的一个很好的纪念品。

en: Excuse me; allow me to point out three errors in the above article.
zh: 打扰一下，请允许我指出以上文章中的三个错误。

en: It is difficult to keep up a conversation with someone who only says "yes" and "no".
zh: 和一个只会说“是”和“否”的人保持对话是很困难的。

en: Do you speak Italian?
zh: 你会说意大利语吗？

en: "I can't think with that noise," she said, as she stared at the typewriter.
zh: “我没法在这么吵的环境下思考，”她一边盯着打字机一边说。

en: It is said that "Hamlet" is the most interesting play ever written.
zh: 据说《哈姆雷特》是有史以来最有趣的戏剧。

en: May I ask a question?
zh: 我可以问个问题吗？

en: "How do you feel?" he inquired.
zh: “你感觉怎么样？”他问道。

en: It's quite difficult to master French in 2 or 3 years.
zh: 在两三年内掌握法语是相当困难的。

en: It's impossible for me to explain it to you.
zh: 我不可能向你解释清楚。

en: I don't want to spend the rest of my life regretting it.
zh: 我不想在余生中为此感到后悔。

en: It would be fun to see how things change over the years.
zh: 看看这些年来事情会如何变化会很有趣。

en: I would never have guessed that.
zh: 我永远也猜不到。

en: Imagination affects every aspect of our lives.
zh: 想象力影响着我们生活的方方面面。

en: You'll forget about me someday.
zh: 总有一天你会忘记我的。

en: That is rather unexpected.
zh: 这真是出乎意料。

en: I wonder how long it's going to take.
zh: 我想知道这要花多长时间。

en: I can't live without a TV.
zh: 我不能没有电视。

en: What's taking you so long?
zh: 你怎么这么慢？

en: What would you like to drink?
zh: 你想喝点什么？

en: I can't understand what you're trying to get at.
zh: 我不明白你想表达什么。

en: I have a very vague idea of what you are talking about.
zh: 我对你在说什么只有一个非常模糊的概念。

en: Not knowing what to say, I remained silent.
zh: 不知道该说什么，我保持沉默。

en: Thank you all the same.
zh: 还是要谢谢你。

en: For some reason or other she shook her head.
zh: 不知什么原因，她摇了摇头。

en: Reflect on your own motives when making a decision.
zh: 在做决定时，反思你自己的动机。

en: Because of some technical problem, a movie was shown in place of the announced program.
zh: 由于一些技术问题，电影代替了宣布的节目。

en: What is most important is your strong will to master English.
zh: 最重要的是你掌握英语的强烈意志。

en: The most important thing is thinking for oneself.
zh: 最重要的是独立思考。

en: Above all, you must take good care of yourself.
zh: 首先，你必须好好照顾自己。

en: I love to jog more than anything else in the world.
zh: 我最喜欢跑步。

en: What I need worst is a haircut.
zh: 我最需要的是理发。

en: Duty should come before anything else.
zh: 义务应该高于一切。

en: The one resource more precious than any other was land.
zh: 比任何其他资源都更珍贵的资源是土地。

en: You should put safety before everything else.
zh: 你应该把安全放在首位。

en: We must put safety before anything else.
zh: 我们必须把安全放在首位。

en: Chiefly, I want you to be more frank.
zh: 主要的是，我希望你更坦诚。

en: You must, above all, be faithful to your friends.
zh: 首先，你必须忠于你的朋友。

en: Best of all, he learns things fast.
zh: 最好的是，他学东西很快。

en: Above all, don't tell a lie.
zh: 首先，不要说谎。

en: Above all, be patient.
zh: 首先，要有耐心。

en: Above all, be true to yourself.
zh: 首先，要做真实的自己。

en: Above all, we must be healthy.
zh: 首先，我们必须保持健康。

en: How long will you be gone?
zh: 你要走多久？

en: How many days does it usually take to get there?
zh: 通常要几天才能到那里？

en: About how many days will it take to get there?
zh: 大概要几天才能到那里？

en: How long will it take?
zh: 要多久？

en: If I've told you once, I've told you a thousand times.
zh: 我已经跟你说过很多遍了。

en: Having heard it so many times, I can recite the poem by heart now.
zh: 听了这么多遍，我现在都能背诵这首诗了。

en: Having failed many times, he never gave up the plan.
zh: 失败了很多次，他从未放弃这个计划。

en: Many times have I scolded him.
zh: 我骂过他很多次了。

en: He has lied to me again and again.
zh: 他一次又一次地对我撒谎。

en: Some books are worth reading over and over again.
zh: 有些书值得反复阅读。

en: Having lost the game over and over again, he finally gave in.
zh: 输了一次又一次，他终于屈服了。

en: Having visited Rome many times, he knows about it well.
zh: 去过罗马很多次，他对那里很了解。

en: Read it again and again.
zh: 一遍又一遍地读。

en: I tried again and again, but I couldn't succeed.
zh: 我尝试了一次又一次，但我没有成功。

en: After several delays, the plane finally left.
zh: 经过几次延误，飞机终于起飞了。

en: I've seen one many times.
zh: 我见过很多次了。

en: Many animals that lived thousands of years ago are now extinct.
zh: 许多生活在几千年前的动物现在已经灭绝了。

en: Thousands of people were milling around in the square.
zh: 广场上挤满了成千上万的人。

en: Thousands of people gathered there.
zh: 成千上万的人聚集在那里。

en: Thousands of people wanted to know the answer.
zh: 成千上万的人想知道答案。

en: Thousands of foreigners visit Japan every year.
zh: 每年有成千上万的外国人访问日本。

en: Thousands of stars shone in the heavens.
zh: 成千上万颗星星在天空中闪耀。

en: Thousands of people were there.
zh: 那里有成千上万的人。

en: Thousands of people visited the city.
zh: 成千上万的人参观了这座城市。

en: Thousands of spectators got very excited.
zh: 成千上万的观众非常兴奋。

en: No matter what you do, you must follow the correct order.
zh: 无论你做什么，都必须遵循正确的顺序。

en: You should make as much effort as possible in whatever you do.
zh: 无论你做什么，都应该尽最大努力。

en: We need money to do anything.
zh: 我们需要钱才能做任何事情。

en: Whatever you do, you must do your best.
zh: 无论你做什么，都必须尽力做到最好。

en: It is up to you to decide what to do.
zh: 做什么由你来决定。

en: I'm doubtful about what I ought to do.
zh: 我不知道该做什么，心里很没底。

en: Not knowing what to do, I called my mother for advice.
zh: 不知道该做什么，我打电话给妈妈寻求建议。

en: My view was different from his as to what should be done.
zh: 对于该做什么，我的看法和他不同。

en: Nobody could decide as to what to do.
zh: 没有人能决定该做什么。

en: I must think about what to do.
zh: 我必须考虑该做什么。

en: You are sure to succeed, whatever you do.
zh: 无论你做什么，你一定会成功的。

en: Whatever you may do, you must do your best.
zh: 无论你做什么，都必须尽力做到最好。

en: What shall we play?
zh: 我们玩什么好呢？

en: It is clear what must be done.
zh: 该做什么很清楚。

en: What do you do to pass the time?
zh: 你做什么来消磨时间？

en: Not knowing what to do, I stood there silently.
zh: 不知道该做什么，我默默地站在那里。

en: Not knowing what to do, I asked for his advice.
zh: 不知道该做什么，我向他寻求建议。

en: Let me know what you're up to.
zh: 告诉我你在做什么。

en: Not knowing what to do, I did nothing.
zh: 不知道该做什么，我什么也没做。

en: I don't have the slightest idea what to do.
zh: 我完全不知道该做什么。

en: Tell me what to do.
zh: 告诉我该怎么做。

en: What do you want to do?
zh: 你想做什么？

en: Please telephone me when you have made up your mind what you want to do.
zh: 当你决定好想做什么的时候，请打电话给我。

en: May I help you ma'am?
zh: 女士，有什么可以帮您吗？

en: What's eating you?
zh: 你怎么了？/ 什么让你心烦？

en: We are all in daily pursuit of happiness.
zh: 我们都在每天追求幸福。

en: We were all shouting at the same time.
zh: 我们当时都在同时大喊大叫。

en: We are all in agreement.
zh: 我们都同意。

en: We all desire success.
zh: 我们都渴望成功。

en: We all went in search of gold.
zh: 我们都去寻找黄金了。

en: We are all impatient for our holiday.
zh: 我们都对假期感到迫不及待。

en: We all suspect him of murder.
zh: 我们都怀疑他犯了谋杀罪。

en: We have to save for a rainy day.
zh: 我们必须未雨绸缪。

en: We won hands down, because the other players were weak.
zh: 我们赢得毫不费力，因为其他选手太弱了。

en: We waited with a faint expectation.
zh: 我们带着一丝期待等待着。

en: We never repent having eaten too little.
zh: 我们从不后悔吃得太少。

en: It behooves us to do our best.
zh: 我们应该尽力而为。

en: We walked more quickly than usual.
zh: 我们比平时走得快。

en: We saw another ship far ahead.
zh: 我们看到远处有另一艘船。

en: We flew to Paris, where we stayed a week.
zh: 我们飞往巴黎，在那里住了一个星期。

en: We almost broke our necks trying to meet the quota.
zh: 为了完成指标，我们差点摔断脖子。

en: We came upon them in New York.
zh: 我们在纽约碰到了他们。

en: We killed time by playing cards.
zh: 我们玩牌来打发时间。

en: We have to call on him tomorrow at any rate.
zh: 无论如何，我们明天都得拜访他。

en: We are getting on first-rate.
zh: 我们进展顺利。

en: We must know about it.
zh: 我们必须了解这件事。

en: We will get through the jungle somehow.
zh: 我们无论如何都会穿过丛林的。

en: We gained the top of Mt. Fuji at last.
zh: 我们终于登上了富士山顶。

en: We had a rough time.
zh: 我们经历了一段艰难的时期。

en: We enjoyed playing tennis.
zh: 我们喜欢打网球。

en: You were late for work.
zh: 你上班迟到了。

en: You should go about your business.
zh: 你应该做你自己的事。

en: You'd better knuckle down to work.
zh: 你最好努力工作。

en: Your hair wants cutting.
zh: 你该理发了。

en: You had better take an umbrella with you.
zh: 你最好带把伞。

en: All you have to do is wash the dish.
zh: 你只需要洗碗。

en: Did you call me up last night?
zh: 你昨晚给我打电话了吗？

en: You are guilty of murder.
zh: 你犯了谋杀罪。

en: You ought to have come to see me yesterday.
zh: 你昨天应该来看我的。

en: Did you go out last night?
zh: 你昨晚出去了吗？

en: You didn't come to school yesterday, did you?
zh: 你昨天没来上学，是吗？

en: You did not come to school yesterday.
zh: 你昨天没来上学。

en: Did you hear about the fire yesterday?
zh: 你听说昨天的火灾了吗？

en: Why were you absent yesterday?
zh: 你昨天为什么缺席？

en: I advise you to be careful in making notes for the lecture.
zh: 我建议你认真做讲座笔记。

en: All you have to do is do your best.
zh: 你只需要尽力而为。

en: You should carry out his offer.
zh: 你应该接受他的提议。

en: You must do your best.
zh: 你必须尽力而为。

en: You should be ready for the worst.
zh: 你应该做好最坏的打算。

en: You work too hard these days. Aren't you tired?
zh: 你最近工作太努力了。你不累吗？

en: You can get in touch with him at his home tonight.
zh: 你今晚可以在他家联系到他。

en: You had better not see her now.
zh: 你现在最好不要见她。

en: You look happy today.
zh: 你今天看起来很高兴。

en: You have a little fever today, don't you?
zh: 你今天有点发烧，是吗？

en: It would be better for you to stay in bed today.
zh: 你今天最好待在床上。

en: There are many old temples in Kyoto.
zh: 京都有很多古老的寺庙。

en: There are a lot of sights in Kyoto.
zh: 京都有很多观光景点。

en: Kyoto has many places to see.
zh: 京都值得一看的地方很多。

en: There are many places to see in Kyoto.
zh: 京都有很多值得一看的地方。

en: I have been to Kyoto once.
zh: 我去过一次京都。

en: There are many sights to see in Kyoto.
zh: 京都有很多值得一看的景点。

en: My brother in Kyoto became a teacher.
zh: 我在京都的哥哥当了老师。

en: Speaking of Kyoto, have you ever visited the Kinkakuji Temple?
zh: 说到京都，你去过金阁寺吗？

en: How about stopping over at Kyoto and sightseeing at the old capital?
zh: 顺道去京都，在古都观光怎么样？

en: In Kyoto, you can see both old and modern buildings.
zh: 在京都，你可以看到古老和现代的建筑。

en: From the airport, the Keisei Line Sky-Liner will take you to Ueno Station in 75 minutes.
zh: 从机场乘坐京成Skyliner线，75分钟即可到达上野站。

en: Kyoko is lying on the grass.
zh: 京子正躺在草地上。

en: Kyoko had the kindness to carry my baggage for me.
zh: 京子好心帮我拿行李。

en: I don't know exactly where Kyoko lives, but it's in the direction of Sannomiya.
zh: 我不太清楚京子住在哪里，但大概是三宫方向。

en: Please hide the blueberry jam where Takako can't see it.
zh: 请把蓝莓酱藏在多加子看不到的地方。

en: Fishing is one of the most popular hobbies.
zh: 钓鱼是最受欢迎的爱好之一。

en: Fishing just isn't my line.
zh: 钓鱼不适合我。

en: I prefer staying home to going fishing.
zh: 比起去钓鱼，我更喜欢待在家里。

en: My hobbies are fishing and watching television.
zh: 我的爱好是钓鱼和看电视。

en: How is it going in the fish market?
zh: 鱼市的生意怎么样？

en: Eating fish is good for your health.
zh: 吃鱼对你的健康有好处。

en: Fish, please.
zh: 请给我鱼。

en: They sell fish and meat.
zh: 他们卖鱼和肉。

en: Fish are cold-blooded animals.
zh: 鱼是冷血动物。

en: A fish swims by moving its tail.
zh: 鱼通过摆动尾巴来游泳。

en: Money cannot buy freedom.
zh: 金钱买不到自由。

en: It goes without saying that money cannot buy happiness.
zh: 不用说，金钱买不到幸福。

en: Money can't buy happiness.
zh: 金钱买不到幸福。

en: Gold will not buy everything.
zh: 黄金并非万能。

en: In this harsh, petty world where money does the talking, his way of life is like a breath of fresh air.
zh: 在这个残酷、庸俗、金钱至上的世界里，他的生活方式就像一股清新的空气。

en: Too much money?
zh: 钱太多了吗？

en: He is rolling in riches.
zh: 他富得流油。

en: It seems like there's no money left.
zh: 好像没钱了。

en: Money talks.
zh: 有钱能使鬼推磨。

en: Little money, few friends.
zh: 人穷朋友少。

en: Money is not everything.
zh: 金钱不是万能的。

en: Some of the money was stolen.
zh: 一部分钱被偷了。

en: If I had money, I would pay what I owe you. As it is, I can't pay.
zh: 如果我有钱，我会还你欠款。但事实上，我没钱还。

en: Money enables you to buy anything.
zh: 金钱能让你买到任何东西。

en: If I were rich, I would do so. As it is, I can do nothing.
zh: 如果我很有钱，我会那样做。但事实上，我什么也做不了。

en: The neighboring countries never submitted to his terrorism.
zh: 邻国从未屈服于他的恐怖主义。

en: Prices have been gradually rising in recent years.
zh: 近年来，物价一直在逐渐上涨。

en: In recent years, they have often moved.
zh: 近年来，他们经常搬家。

en: Many local traditions have fallen into decay in recent years.
zh: 近年来，许多当地传统已经衰落。

en: In recent years, science has made remarkable progress.
zh: 近年来，科学取得了显著的进步。

en: Modern travel enables us to go around the world in a few days.
zh: 现代旅行使我们能够在几天内环游世界。

en: Recent advances in medicine are remarkable.
zh: 最近医学的进步是显著的。

en: In recent years electronic computers have become increasingly important.
zh: 近年来，电子计算机变得越来越重要。

en: Chemistry has made notable progress in recent years.
zh: 近年来，化学取得了显著的进展。

en: We will have some visitors one of these days.
zh: 总有一天我们会迎来一些访客。
